data:
Certainly! Below is a table in markdown format that classifies potential risks for PREVENT-IA and provides mitigation plans:

```markdown
| **Risk**                                        | **Classification** | **Mitigation Plan**                                                                              |
|-------------------------------------------------|--------------------|--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
| Negative public opinion on the use of AI        | High               | Develop transparent communication strategies; emphasize safety and benefits; involve stakeholders early. |
| Dependence on AI model providers                | High               | Diversify AI model providers; establish contingency plans for provider changes.                  |
| Energy consumption                              | Medium             | Implement energy-efficient algorithms and cloud solutions; monitor and optimize energy usage.    |
| AI use regulations                              | Medium             | Stay updated on regulatory changes; ensure compliance by engaging legal and compliance teams.    |
| Unfriendly interfaces                           | Medium             | Conduct regular user testing; incorporate UX/UI improvements based on feedback.                 |
| Low visibility on social media                  | Medium             | Develop a robust marketing strategy; engage with industry influencers and stakeholders.          |
| Difficulty in measuring training quality        | Medium             | Implement robust analytics and feedback mechanisms; constantly refine assessments.               |
| Poor prioritization of functionalities          | Low                | Establish a clear product roadmap; engage stakeholders in prioritization discussions.           |
| Lack of feedback from users                     | Low                | Encourage regular user feedback; provide multiple feedback channels and regularly review inputs. |
| System downtime                                 | Medium             | Ensure robust backup and recovery plans; engage in continuous monitoring and maintenance.       |
| Data breach                                     | High               | Implement strong encryption and access controls; conduct regular security audits.               |
```

Feel free to modify any part of the table according to your specific needs or further details about the risks and mitigation plans!
